titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the king and queen at White-Hall, December 13th. 1691 by Edward Pelling ... ; published by Her Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Pelling, Edward, d. 1718.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print showthrough with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N. Y.) Library.
